backend/main.mo: Core LandCanister Motoko implementation defining land data types, user structures, modifiers, loot caches, and initial access control state.
CANISTER_REINSTALL_GUIDE.md: Instructions for performing a forced reinstall and re-initialization of Land and Asset canisters on IC mainnet, including prerequisites and backup steps.
DEPLOYMENT_CHECKLIST.md: High-level checklist covering environment setup and required frontend .env variables for deployment.
DEPLOYMENT_GUIDE.md: Mainnet deployment guide detailing requirements and the sequence for creating and deploying all canisters and 3D assets.
DEPLOYMENT_INSTRUCTIONS.md: Brief instructions outlining critical environment setup and the required order for deploying all canisters.
DEVELOPER_README.md: Developer documentation describing system architecture, canister responsibilities, and project overview for the CyberGenesis DApp.
ENVIRONMENT_CONFIGURATION.md: Guide listing required frontend environment variables and network configuration settings.
ENVIRONMENT_SETUP.md: Setup guide explaining environment configuration and backend canister deployment to resolve common initialization errors.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a shader update in CubeVisualization.tsx and its associated components and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-like list summarizing key frontend files, including component behaviors, UI styling, and rendering logic.
frontend/.env: Production environment configuration for IC mainnet containing required canister IDs, admin principal, and stability settings.
frontend/.env.example: Template environment file showing required variables, canister IDs, and optional debug settings for local or mainnet use.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entrypoint loading the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling identity, actor initialization, profile setup flow, and system initialization UI with backgrounds.
frontend/src/asset-backend.d.ts: Type definitions for asset backend, including asset data structures, user roles, and available canister methods.
frontend/src/asset-backend.idl.ts: Candid IDL service definition for the asset canister with upload, query, admin, and profile functions.
frontend/src/backend.idl.ts: Candid IDL for the main backend canister defining land data, rewards, modifiers, upgrades, HTTP transforms, and user role functions.
frontend/src/components/AdminGLBUpload.t: React component for authorized admins to upload GLB models with health checks, drag-and-drop, and progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/AdminPanel.tsx: Simplified admin UI for uploading GLB files with periodic health checks and basic validation.
frontend/src/components/AssetCanisterDia: Runs detailed diagnostics on the asset canister including connectivity, permissions, cycle balance, and logging.
frontend/src/components/AssetCanisterRei: Provides admin-only canister reinitialization workflow with pre-checks, post-checks, and authorization verification.
frontend/src/components/CanisterDiagnost: Runs connectivity tests against IC gateways for canisters, aggregates health reports, and displays status with auto-refresh.
frontend/src/components/CanisterIDVerifi: Checks environment variables for expected canister IDs and displays correctness indicators for each.
Validates required environment variables at runtime and renders a warning banner when configuration errors are detected.
frontend/src/components/CosmicBackground: Renders an animated 2D canvas background with stars and nebula effects using optimized drawing loops.
frontend/src/components/CubeVisualizatio: Displays biome-based 3D land models with lighting, shaders, and postprocessing using React Three Fiber.
frontend/src/components/CyberCube.tsx: Empty placeholder file noting all 3D logic was moved to LandModel.tsx.
frontend/src/components/DeploymentVerifi: Checks health of two canisters using actors, updates status periodically, and displays state with icons and refresh controls.
frontend/src/components/Discovery.tsx: Manages discovering and processing loot caches, handling token costs, land charge, and updating queries after actions.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary that catches render errors and displays a styled fallback or custom fallback.
frontend/src/components/Governance.tsx: Implements token staking, proposal creation, and voting with validation, mutation calls, and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/LandDashboard.ts: Displays selected land info, claim cooldowns, token balances, and handles reward claiming, upgrades, and modifier application.
frontend/src/components/LandModel.tsx: Loads and configures a GLTF land model with KTX2 textures, biome-based emissive effects, and material adjustments for rendering.
frontend/src/components/LandSelector.tsx: Carousel-like selector for navigating lands, showing plot name, biome label, and index with prev/next buttons.
frontend/src/components/Leaderboard.tsx: Fetches and displays a top-10 ranked lands list with loading and error states, showing plot info and token balance.
frontend/src/components/MapView.tsx: Interactive canvas map with panning, zooming, gesture handling, and continuous rendering, centering on the user's land.
frontend/src/components/Marketplace.tsx: Marketplace UI for viewing, filtering, buying, listing, and canceling land and modifier items with dialogs and mutations.
File is empty or missing implementation.
frontend/src/components/NetworkDiagnosti: Runs periodic asset-canister health checks, tracking connectivity, latency, failures, and displaying network status.
frontend/src/components/ParticleBackgrou: Animated 2D canvas particle system with drifting particles and connecting lines as a visual background.
frontend/src/components/PlotCustomizatio: UI for editing a land plot's name and decoration URL using update mutations. Loads selected land data and provides input fields with validation and update buttons.
frontend/src/components/PlugWalletButton: Connect/disconnect button for Plug Wallet with dropdown showing principal and actions. Handles connecting, copying principal, and logout.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Form for creating a user profile by entering a name and saving via mutation. Shows success and error toasts.
frontend/src/components/Reinitialization: Full‑screen overlay showing reconnection attempts, gateway info, and progress indicator. Used during automatic network reinitialization.
frontend/src/components/ThreeErrorBounda: Error boundary that catches 3D rendering errors and displays a fallback UI. Provides reset functionality and logs detailed error info.
frontend/src/config/mainnet.ts: Mainnet configuration for canister IDs, asset URLs, model filenames, wallet settings, and validation. Includes helpers to initialize config and generate model URLs.
Context managing Plug Wallet connection state, principal, actor creation, and connect/disconnect logic. Provides UI notifications and checks for plugin availability.
frontend/src/data/modifierCatalog.ts: Defines a placeholder static catalog of planned modifiers with IDs, names, tiers, and asset URLs.
frontend/src/governance-backend.d.ts: TypeScript definitions for governance canister data models and interface methods including proposals, voting, and staking.
frontend/src/governance-backend.idl.ts: Candid IDL factory describing the governance canister’s service methods and data record/variant structures.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that initializes and caches a backend actor, recreating it when identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorReinitializer: Provides automatic multi-gateway actor reinitialization with retries, delays, status tracking, and user notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithInit.ts: Wraps useActor with additional initialization, timeout handling, and multi-step connectivity polling to ensure backend readiness.
frontend/src/hooks/useAssetActor.ts: Creates and maintains an asset canister actor with environment validation, multi-gateway failover, health checks, and retry logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useAssetHealth.ts: Simple hook performing a delayed health check against the asset canister and returning its health status.
frontend/src/hooks/useAssetUpload.ts: React hook for uploading GLB files to an asset canister using Plug Wallet, handling authorization, file reading, progress, and errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useGovernanceActor.ts: Initializes and retries creation of a governance canister actor with Internet Identity and gateway failover.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and helpers for managing Internet Identity login, logout, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useMarketplaceActor.t: Initializes and retries creation of a marketplace canister actor with Internet Identity and gateway failover.
Defines reusable Plug Wallet transaction hooks for token, marketplace, and governance canisters with react‑query.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for land data, profiles, token balance, governance, and marketplace operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useTokenActor.ts: React hook that initializes and retries creation of a token canister actor with gateway failover and timeout handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining dark theme variables, fonts, neon effects, and glassmorphism UI utilities.
frontend/src/lib/buildInfo.ts: Generates build metadata, provides cache‑busting URL utility, and logs build info on startup.
frontend/src/lib/debugConfig.ts: Debug module for 3D features offering logging, GPU diagnostics, renderer detection, and performance tools.
frontend/src/lib/modelLoader.ts: Empty module placeholder for model loading functionality.
frontend/src/lib/tokenUtils.ts: Utility functions for formatting and parsing ICRC‑1 token amounts with decimal handling and separators.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point mounting React, initializing QueryClient, and providing Internet Identity context.
frontend/src/marketplace-backend.d.ts: TypeScript definitions for the marketplace canister including ItemType, Listing, BuyResult, and interface methods.
frontend/src/marketplace-backend.idl.ts: Candid IDL factory defining the marketplace service, record types, and variant result for buy operations.
frontend/src/pages/Collection.tsx: Renders a modifier collection page with tier-based styling and counts from the modifier catalog.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard showing land data and multiple tabs, using React Query and actor-based data fetching.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing screen handling Internet Identity login with animated UI feedback and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/MintingPage.tsx: Displays loading state for land initialization and confirms setup before redirecting to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/VerificationPage.tsx: Page for validating project canister IDs with a verification component and styled background.
frontend/src/token-backend.d.ts: TypeScript definitions for token backend interfaces, including transfers, metadata, and admin controls.
frontend/src/token-backend.idl.ts: IDL factory defining service methods and types for interacting with the token canister.
frontend/src/types/webgpu.d.ts: Type declarations enabling WebGPU API usage and detection in TypeScript without errors.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration extending colors, animations, shadows, and container settings with plugins and custom design tokens.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite config enabling React, environment variable prefixes, build timestamping, WASM asset support, aliases, and dev server proxying.
project_state.json: JSON state describing shader-fix requirements, known issues, and pending feature requests for the background sphere rendering.
README_RUSSIAN.md: Russian-language deployment overview with requirements and quick start steps for CyberGenesis.
scripts/upload_assets_mainnet.sh: Mainnet upload script for .glb assets that handles base64 conversion, rate limiting, verification, and canister ID resolution.
scripts/upload_assets.sh: Local network script that uploads tiered .glb model files to the AssetCanister using dfx and verifies uploaded assets.
unknown.txt: Contains a single line referencing testing a health endpoint.
